992160.name: Amaze VR - Show Pack 1
992160.description:
New Amaze VR Show DLC Pack


DLC Pack includes two 180° 3D VR Shows at a discounted price.

• Elements (13 mins, 4 parts): Join Claudia on an immersive journey through the four elements: Wind, Earth, Water, and Fire.

• Jagged (12 mins, 4 parts): Watch on as aerialists defy gravity. Get lost in the momentum of the Cyr Wheel. Become entranced with LED hoops. Raw and powerful… experience JAGGED.
992160.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
